name: Bookshelf
overview: Allow people to create and share their book collection with others.

name: JSTOR Forum
overview: Allow institutions to manage, describe, and distribute their digital collections and projects to increase discoverability and use.

name: Codework
overview: Help people learn JavaScript in a fun and collaborative way.

name: React Hooks Example
overview: Example app to talk through React hooks and how they compare to higher order components and render props

name: React Tip Calculator
overview: Example app to talk through the differences between React and Vue

name: Vue Grid Calculator
overview: Proof of concept Vue calculator to experiment with vue-testing-library

name: Loan Payoff Calculator
overview: Encourage people to take control of their financial future by showing the impact of early loan payoff in terms of time and money savings.
